pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simplified Language for Plots and Charts // Provides a very simple syntax for the user to generate custom plot(s) without having to remember complicated 'ggplot2' syntax. The 'chartql' package uses 'ggplot2' and manages all the syntax complexities internally. As an example, to generate a bar chart of company sales faceted by product category further faceted by season of the year, we simply write: "CHART bar X category, season Y sales".
